text: Prakash Mehrotra (26 February 1925 – 7 March 1988) was an Indian politician from the Indian National Congress. He was member of Rajya Sabha, the upper house of the Parliament of India, representing the state of Uttar Pradesh from 3 April 1976 to 9 August 1981. He was married to Preeti Mehrotra and had 1 son and 4 daughters. He served as the Governor of Assam and of Meghalaya (10 August 1981 – 28 March 1984). == References == Category:1925 births Category:1988 deaths Category:Indian National Congress politicians from Uttar Pradesh Category:Governors of Assam Category:Governors of Meghalaya Category:Rajya Sabha members from Uttar Pradesh
title: Prakash Mehrotra
